Class NodeAgent

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglet.Aglet
      NodeAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NodeAgent
extends com.ibm.aglet.Aglet

This class is spawned for each node in the Distributed Consensus Problem.

See Also:

Method Detail

run

public void run()
This method is executed after an instance of NodeAgent has been created and is now residing on a Tahiti server.

startTokenThread

public void startTokenThread()
This method will start the CheckForTokenThread, but only if it hasn't already been started.

deployToken

public void deployToken()
This method will launch a new token onto the distributed network. It will also try to start the startTokenThread() so that the thread can begin if it hasn't already

isTokenInquiryHere

public boolean isTokenInquiryHere()
This method checks the local Tahiti server for a TokenInquiry aglet and returns a boolean value appropriately

Returns:
boolean

disposeTokenIfPresent

public void disposeTokenIfPresent()
This thread will search for a TokenAgent on this Tahiti server; if one is found, it will be ordered to dispose of itself.

getName

This allows an external object to see the name of this NodeAgent (ie NodeAgentFrame).

String
